name: The Searcher Wild West Adventure
description:
You play as a treasure hunter who can move through time thanks to the chip embedded in it. Once our hero decided to move to the past - to the wild west, to find the ancient treasure - Masson Gold.
Features:
-Game genre: find all the items
-2 modes - a single player (several missions) and a multiplayer-co-op (a large map where you can play with a friend and look for Masonic gold together)
-In multiplayer-coop mode maximum 4 players on server
-Simple and fun gameplay (just go and look for gold.To complete the level you need to find all the gold bars on the map)
-Several levels available for playing
-Various locations
-Thematic: Wild West of Old Time
-Low-poly graphics
-Steam achievements
